description: Picking a new leader for the WTO will be a challenge for Joe Biden as the global economy struggles with coronavirus.
title: Trump trade chief wants WTO leadership race reopened
title_page: Trump trade chief wants WTO leadership race reopened - BBC News
maintext: "We need to start negotiating again, we need to start making headway. So I'm glad you brought up the WTO, it's been clearly a focus for us and to us its an organisation that started off as a good idea and basically isn't functioning very well, but I think that can be sorted out also."
